mapper.insert: insert into TB_CAB001M (BOARD_ID, BOARD_NM, BOARD_DESC, TASK_SE_CD, BEGIN_DTE, END_DTE, ATTCH_FILE_YN, IMG_VIEWR_YN, REPLY_YN, HIDDN_YN, DEL_YN, USE_YN, REGIST_USR_ID, REGIST_DT, UPDT_USR_ID, UPDT_DT) values (#{boardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{boardNm,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{boardDesc,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{taskSeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beginDte,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endDte,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attchFileYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgViewrYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{replyYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hiddnYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'N', 'Y', #{registUsrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, getdate(), #{updtUsrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, getdate())
